page.title: 15A TYPICAL DAY IN N.S.
page.content: When I get up I have my breakfast on my own.I have cereal,porridge and toast.I go to school at about 8.30am and it starts at 9.10am.Sometimes I cycle to school but I usually walk.We have a break for twenty minutes at 11am.At 12.30pm we have a lunch break until 1.30pm.Then we have two hours of work.The subjects we get are usually maths,language,project and sometimes creative writing,music,art,P.E., swimming and television.After school I sometimes play football,badminton or do athletics but other nights I go straight home.If I go home I play with my friends or I play on my computer.At tea time I usually have vegetables, potatoes and meat and for pudding I usually have ice_cream.After tea I sometimes go to play in a silver band. Other nights I stay in or go out to play.I go to bed at about 9_10pm.
